animeDescription: Childish goings-on for Fukuo Fuchida (also known as Fuku-chan) a small boy who attends nursery school with his "girlfriend" Kumi and hangs out with his playmates Namiko (whose parents own a china shop), her younger brother, Kiyo, naughty twins Doshako and Garako and school bully Ganchan.  (Source: Anime Encyclopedia)
animeRelated: ['Fuku-chan no Sensuikan', 'Fuku-chan no Kishuu', 'Fuku-chan no Zousan Butai']
